content: That's correct. In Liyue, Filon kept his superpowers hidden and led a relatively normal life as a tram driver and instructor. However, after the fight with the adepti from Inazuma, Filon revealed his powers to everyone and made it clear that he would use them to protect himself and the people of Liyue from tyrannical rule. Despite the struggle, his relationship with Ganyu remained strong, as she understood that he was only defending himself. However, his relationships with Ningguang and Zhongli were strained, as they saw him as a threat to their rule and power. Filon also revealed his powers to Yanfei, who was shocked by his abilities and struggled with the moral implications of what had occurred.
